biocode.fims.bcid

Class Resolver

  • java.lang.Object
    • biocode.fims.bcid.Resolver

  • public class Resolver
extends java.lang.Object
    Resolves any incoming Bcid to the BCID and/or EZID systems. Resolver first checks if this is a data group. If so, it then checks if there is a decodable BCID. If not, then check if there is a suffix and if THAT is resolvable.

      • Resolver

        public Resolver(java.lang.String expeditionCode,
                java.lang.Integer projectId,
                java.lang.String conceptAlias)
        Find the appropriate BCID ROOT for this expedition given an conceptAlias.
        Parameters:
        expeditionCode - defines the BCID expeditionCode to lookup
        conceptAlias - defines the alias to narrow this, a one-word reference denoting a BCID
